title: The Miracle Morning - Hal Elrod
description:
Basic premise of the book is:
* Wake up early.
* Do the stuff you know you should be doing but aren't; Meditate, Affirmations, Visualise, Exercise, Read something constructive, Write something constructive.


"What's being widely regarded as "one of the most life changing books ever written" may be the simplest approach to achieving everything you've ever wanted, and faster than you ever thought possible.

What if you could wake up tomorrow and anyâ€”or EVERYâ€”area of your life was beginning to transform? What would you change? The Miracle Morning is already transforming the lives of tens of thousands of people around the world by showing them how to wake up each day with more ENERGY, MOTIVATION, and FOCUS to take your life to the next level. Itâ€™s been right here in front of us all along, but this book has finally brought it to life."

Are you ready? The next chapter of YOUR lifeâ€”the most extraordinary life you've ever imaginedâ€”is about to begin. Itâ€™s time to WAKE UP to your full potential
